CustomField.description: To be used only in the Flow. Is the Opportunity Purchase Price same as Product Purchase Price?
CustomField.formula: IF( NOT (OR (ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, 'Send to Order Management'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, 'Order Issue'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, 'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(Opportunity.StageName, 'Closed Lost') ) ), (Purchase_Price__c = Pricebook_Purchase_Price__c), TRUE)
CustomField.label: Is Opp PP same as Product PP?
